tool_description: This API allows users to retrieve data related to GST (Goods and Services Tax) and obtain owner details associated with a GST number.

api_list.name: GST Number Search Tool & GSTIN Verification Online
api_list.description: This API endpoint enables users to search for GST numbers and verify GSTIN (Goods and Services Tax Identification Number) online.

required_parameters.name: GST
required_parameters.description: The GST number to be searched or verified.
